 void clearInputBuffers()
          Moves cells from this nics input buffer to its output buffer
 void clearOutputBuffers()

Method Detail

sendCell

public void sendCell(ATMCell cell,
                     IATMCellConsumer parent)
This method is called when a cell is passed to this nic to be sent. The cell is placed in an output buffer until a time unit passes

Parameters:
cell - the cell to be sent (placed in the buffer)
parent - the router the cell came from
Since:
1.0
